text: You enter the village and investigate. You find one useful robot, a Digger Robot. This slow but powerful machine rides on treads. It has a bulldozer blade on the front, a scoop-shovel on the back, and two large claws for lifting.

abilities.name: Powerful Strike
abilities.description: Activate: -2 to roll. +4 damage on hit.
